name: Epidemic Tower
description:
Epidemic Tower is a local co-op game for 1-4 players.

Players will cooperate with their allies to take down hordes of undead with teamwork. Help carry around your injured allies, free them from a zombie's grasp, and watch out in case they turn in this simple 2D endless shooter.

Epidemic Tower is played all on one keyboard, and local multiplayer can go online with the help of the external software Parsec.
